timeline.bodyText:
use epoch maybe better than since.datetime.
Just make consist with SnowflakeKeyGenerateAlgorithm
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: use partition.seconds maybe better than partition.volume.
timeline.author: terrymanu

timeline.bodyText: It is pretty slow if loop for every second, could we consider about increase for one partition range once?
timeline.author: terrymanu

replies.bodyText: I will consider it in my next PR
replies.author: tristaZero

timeline.bodyText: SimpleDateFormat is not thread safe, is it possible to call SimpleDateFormat.parse() concurrently? if so, perhaps use LocalDateTime and DateTimeFormatter is better
timeline.author: SanmuWangZJU

replies.bodyText:
@ SanmuWangZJU

SimpleDateFormat is not thread safe, is it possible to call SimpleDateFormat.parse() concurrently? if so, perhaps use LocalDateTime and DateTimeFormatter is better

Hi, Thanks for your suggestion which helps raize #5341, welcome your review and comments.
replies.author: tristaZero
